data: Monkeys | Snakes | Cocoanut Hill | Tertiary Age
ninety years after the fight between the Monkeys and Snakes on Cocoanut Hill | five hundred thousand years before our era | near the end of the Tertiary Age

About ninety years after the fight between the Monkeys and Snakes on Cocoanut Hill, which was five hundred thousand years before our era, and near the end of the Tertiary Age, Sosee was sitting on a limb sucking a mango, when Koree came up in great consternation.

From Monkey to Man, or, Society in the Tertiary Age
A Story of the Missing Link, Showing the First Steps in Industry, Commerce, Government, Religion and the Arts; With an Account of the Great Expedition From Cocoanut Hill and the Wars in Alligator Swamp
